page.title: 04GAINSBOROUGH MARKET PLACE
page.content: The shops in the Market Place are Beltons the newsagent which sells stationery and sweets,Stead and Simpson a shoe shop,W.H.Ball the Chemist which sells medicines,cough sweets and combs,Wilkinsons which is a D.I.Y shop,the Nationwide Building Society,,Boots the Chemist which sells combs,medicines and cameras,Woolworths which sells stationery,clothes,cutlery,paint and food,Greenwoods which is a menswear shop,The card shop which sells cards,Curtess which sells shoes and trainers,Lincspeed which is a van hire shop,Granada TV Rental where you can rent a TV for the month,Midland Bank , Co-op which is a big department store selling clothes,food,furniture and footwear;Bakers Oven which sells cakes bread and snacks;hardwicks sell paint and wallpaper;Chilvers-fruit ,flowers.
